title: Atomic/molecular layer deposition strategies for enhanced CO2 capture, utilisation and storage materials
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00759F, Review Article
Joshua O. Olowoyo, Vahid Shahed Gharahshiran, Yimin Zeng, Yang Zhao, Ying Zheng
This review focuses on the use of atomic and molecular layer deposition techniques (ALD/MLD) to design materials and their applications in CO2 utilization, CO2 capture and separation as well as CO2 sensing.
